key_risks: Pricing changes and customer backlash due to price increases and cloud-first strategy
Intense competition from Microsoft Teams, Asana, and Monday.com
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on subscription-based revenue
Data privacy and security concerns in cloud-based services
Legal and regulatory challenges, including securities fraud class action
controversies: Customer dissatisfaction with pricing changes and discontinuation of server products
Securities fraud class action lawsuit filed in February 2023
Workforce restructuring with a 5% reduction in employees
social_issues: Workforce restructuring impacting employee morale and operational efficiency
governance_issues: Legal scrutiny and disputes over jurisdiction in legal cases
